tiles.title: stateful
tiles.text: stateful is a Pebble watchapp designed to control RESTful API's with minimal clicks.

tiles.title: MPRIS panel
tiles.text: MPRIS panel is a gnome shell extension that uses a 'smart-switching' technique to effortlessly control multiple media players in linux.

tiles.title: kindlepass
tiles.text: kindlepass helps older kindle devices continue to use the Amazon Audible service

tiles.title: snowdon II wifi
tiles.text: Snowdon II Wifi is a hardware mod for the Snowdon II soundbar that transforms it into an IoT device.
